original_title: Disney's Animal World: Penguins and Seals & Sea Lions
overview: Learning about animals is fun when your favorite Disney characters lead the way!  Stunning live-action wildlife clips of animals in their natural habitats are combined with heart-warming footage from Disney's animated classics to introduce youngsters to the world of animals.  Each segment stars a different animal, offering kids detailed information about the animal's habitat, living conditions, behavior, diet, survival techniques, and life cycle.
title: Disney's Animal World: Penguins and Seals & Sea Lions
